types.html:
feuj (feminine feuje, masculine plural feujs, feminine plural feujes)

  1. (Verlan, sometimes derogatory) Jewish
    • 2015 January, Virginie Despentes, Vernon Subutex, volume 1, Éditions Grasset, →ISBN:
      Tout ce que Paris compte de minets, pédés, zyvas, sapeurs, négros, bolosses, étudiants, bicots, bracass et beaux gosses se retrouve chez H&M pour enfiler les derniers molards de la mode, tout ce que le capital feuj cherche à leur fourguer de merdes fabriquées par des gosses à l'autre bout du monde — et ces connards payent pour porter ça.
      All the pussies, queers, buffoons, dressed-up blacks, niggas, losers, students, wogs, good-for-nothings, and hotshots in Paris gather at H&M to put on the latest fashions, all the crap that capitalist Jews are trying to sell them made by kids on the other side of the world - and these assholes pay to wear it.

Usage notes

[edit]
  • The feminine form is rarely used, with the masculine feuj usually replacing it.

title: feuj
